name: Tactical Combat Operations
description:
Hello everyone. I'm a fan of RTS genre such as Command and Conquer Generals, which my game is grounded on. I hope as me, you could enjoy this game. 
I did that game based on a mod that  I did for Generals as you will see further, with a hint of a very old underrated game called World War III Black Gold (Reality Pump - 2001) 
Please, download, play it and post your feedbacks as this Demo version is serving as benchmark for the future releases.
